DOC.brief_summary: Since introduction late 1990s , immediate implant load concept ( IL ) become frequent alternative delay implant procedure . IL concepts reduce chair time , number surgical intervention pain , offer instant comfort patient . Its reduced treatment time result obvious socioeconomic advantage . Although present abundant evidence support IL , evaluation long-term biological mechanical stability outcomes large patient population could allow quality improvement accurate patient selection . The Departments Oral Maxillofacial Surgery Department Dentistry General Hospital Saint-John Bruges act one pioneer IL Belgium , routinely perform concept since 2001 . The investigator aim evaluate biological mechanical short- long-term outcome IL partially completely edentulous patient . Moreover , investigator aim detect potential influencing risk factor predict undesirable prosthetic outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Immediate Loading Implants Partially Completely Edentulous Jaw
DOC.criteria: patient age patient gender patient partially complete edentulous jaw patient treat department 01/01/2001 31/12/2015 patient eligible accord abovementioned criterion patient require horizontal bone augmentation procedures complete alveolar bone patient require jaw reconstruction tumor resection , osteoradionecrosis medicationrelated osteonecrosis jaw
